mapper.select: SELECT * FROM company_orgnization_detail WHERE userName = #{userName} AND userToken = #{userToken}

CREATE TABLE company_multiple.${company} ( userName VARCHAR(20) PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, apartment VARCHAR(20), team VARCHAR(20), level INT, realName VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'unknown', departmentDescription VARCHAR(255), teamDescription VARCHAR(255), headImageUrl VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT '0' );
INSERT company_multiple.${company} SET userName = ${userName},level = 4,headImageUrl = (SELECT headImageUrl FROM capisce.user_info_log_in WHERE userName = ${userName});

INSERT company_orgnization_detail SET company = #{company},userName = #{userName}, userToken = ( SELECT userToken FROM user_info_log_in WHERE userName = #{userName}), level = 4, realName = ( SELECT realName FROM user_info_log_in WHERE userName = #{userName}), companyIcon = #{companyIcon}
